We Love Raves: The developers over at FFF Love raves. This app is designed with a rave function where if you shake the phone enough, it'll change to random colors.
purpose_and_design: This app was designed so that you could have a less intense forward-facing flashlight for when your rear flashlight is too intense for its use case.
brightness_control_tip: Did you know there's a way to turn your brightness down lower than what the bar allows you to do on the control panel? Go to Settings > Accessibility > Display & Text Size and then enable the Reduced White Point option. This will make it so that your phone doesn't blind you when you're using it at night.
